sentences.en: Next up is this little bubble dress. I love it so much.
sentences.zh: 接下来是这条小泡泡裙。我超爱它！
sentences.phonetic_us: /nɛkst ʌp ɪz ðɪs ˈlɪtəl ˈbʌbəl drɛs. aɪ lʌv ɪt soʊ mʌtʃ/

sentences.en: I love how it's kind of like a tube top material at the top, and then it goes into like a little bubble skirt.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢它上半身是类似抹胸的材质，然后往下就变成小泡泡裙。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ lʌv haʊ ɪts kaɪnd əv laɪk ə tub tɑp məˈtɪriəl æt ðə tɑp, ænd ðɛn ɪt ɡoʊz ˈɪntu laɪk ə ˈlɪtəl ˈbʌbəl skɜrt/

sentences.en: And I was kind of hesitant on how this was going to fit, cuz I'm like, 'oh my gosh, it looks so short.'
sentences.zh: 一开始我有点担心它会不会合身，心想"天啊，看起来好短啊。"
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd aɪ wəz kaɪnd əv ˈhɛzɪtənt ɑn haʊ ðɪs wəz ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə fɪt, kʌz aɪm laɪk, 'oʊ maɪ ɡɑʃ, ɪt lʊks soʊ ʃɔrt.'/

sentences.en: But honestly, I'm very comfortable in it, and it has a kind of a cup underneath, so I feel very secure in it if that makes sense.
sentences.zh: 但说实话，我穿起来非常舒适，而且里面还有一个小杯垫，所以穿起来很有安全感，你懂我的意思吧。
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt ˈɑnəstli, aɪm ˈvɛri ˈkʌmfərtəbəl ɪn ɪt, ænd ɪt hæz ə kaɪnd əv ə kʌp ˌʌndərˈniθ, soʊ aɪ fil ˈvɛri sɪˈkjʊr ɪn ɪt ɪf ðæt meɪks sɛns/

sentences.en: But this is like a little doll dress and I'm obsessed.
sentences.zh: 这件裙子就像一件小娃娃裙，我完全爱上了！
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt ðɪs ɪz laɪk ə ˈlɪtəl dɑl drɛs ænd aɪm əbˈsɛst/

sentences.en: I feel like a little Polly Pocket in this, and with kitten heels.
sentences.zh: 穿上它再搭配小猫跟鞋，我感觉自己像个小Polly Pocket洋娃娃。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ fil laɪk ə ˈlɪtəl ˈpɑli ˈpɑkɪt ɪn ðɪs, ænd wɪð ˈkɪtən hilz/

sentences.en: This would be amazing for any event.
sentences.zh: 这样搭配穿去任何场合都很合适。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðɪs wʊd bi əˈmeɪzɪŋ fɔr ˈɛni ɪˈvɛnt/
